You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &times

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&times;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d7/index.htm U+000D7].
  * `&times` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d7/index.htm U+000D7].
   * _Aren't entities invalid without a closing semicolon?_
